Summary: Slide and flick to Pair up emojis! Don`t your time or VIRUS will infect your emojis. Complete the task to witness how emoji show you how to love.
Description: Clash of Emoji is a puzzle game like Bejeweled but instead of jewel... Emoji! but be careful not to waste time, because nasty VIRUS will eat your precious emojis! Conquer it by pairing 4 emoji to form an ANGRY emoji which destroy surrounding emojis, pair up 2 Angry emoji to form a DEMON emoji which straight line emojis and collum and pair up 2 DEMON to form a MONRSTER emoji which clears up an entire L shape on the grid.
Features: Saving, Loading, Clearing of Saved data, Sound & Background FX, Leader board, Themes, Hint.
